name: ao-raycast
title: AO Raycast
description: Search and browse ArNS names with gateway support
author: dpshade22

commands.name: arns
commands.title: Search Arweave Domains
commands.label: Search Arweave Domains
commands.description: Search and browse ArNS names with gateway support

commands.name: openData
commands.title: Open Transaction Data
commands.label: Open Transaction Data
commands.description: View raw data of an Arweave transaction using configurable gateways

commands.name: openExplorer
commands.title: Open in Explorer
commands.label: Open in Explorer
commands.description: View an Arweave transaction in ao.link explorer

preferences.name: useWayfinder
preferences.title: Use Wayfinder Protocol
preferences.description: Use the wayfinder protocol to automatically select the best gateway
preferences.label: Enable Wayfinder Protocol

preferences.name: defaultGateway
preferences.title: Default Gateway
preferences.description: The default gateway to use when wayfinder is disabled (e.g., ar.io, arweave.net, defi.ao)
preferences.label: Default Gateway URL

preferences.name: explorer
preferences.title: Explorer
preferences.description: The explorer URL template. Use {txId} as placeholder (e.g., ao.link/#/message/{txId}, viewblock.io/arweave/tx/{txId})
preferences.label: Explorer URL Template

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`bun publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`bun run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
